content: Hey Tom Thumb, You should thank your lucky stars that at least you had the opportunity to be in the same room as your elected representative. Mine, Anna Eshoo refuses to even hold a public townhall meeting. I’m going to suggest to the McClintock that he start to only hold “Telephone Town Halls” like his colleagues Anna Eshoo and the now defeated Mike Honda hold. That way he can censor you out from speaking just as Anna Eshoo does her Conservative constituents.
